features: Stowable, fully adjustable hood with signature double-stripe reflective details at the back for added visibility in low light
Heritage-inspired webbing grab strap at upper back with Canada Goose emblem patch
Mesh venting underneath back panel and gun flaps provide breathability and air flow without compromising element protection
Waist features interior drawcords for adaptable fit and warmth retention
Storm flap underneath 2-way zipper keeps the elements out with Hypalan® zipper pulls for added grip. Unzip from the bottom for added range of motion or venting
Shaped hem with gusseted side seam zippers that allow for range of motion while maintaining coverage and protection
Scalloped cuffs add coverage and to seal out the elements with adjustable reflective snap closures
6 exterior pockets: 2 zipper pockets with brushed tricot at knuckle side for added comfort, 2 bonded chest drop-in pockets, 2 zippered mesh pockets underneath chest flap with hidden snap closure
